metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15847 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Android for MSM, Firefox OS for MSM, QRD Android, with all Android releases from CAF using the Linux kernel, in the SPCom kernel driver, a race condition exists when creating a channel.

notes.Note: sbeattie> spcom driver does not exist upstream, marking not-affected

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
